title: U Need A Pita
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fast food burger and pita place frequented by a young crowd. Has vegan poutine, portabello mushroom burger, falafel and hummus pita, veggie burrito pita. Vegan Daiya cheese can be substituted on nacho fries, several vegan sauces, vegetable toppings available for pitas and loaded poutine. Burger buns are vegan suitable, baked by Rise Above bakery located next door. Has another location on Glendale Avenue. NOTE: veg and meatstuff share the same kitchen/cooking utensils.
